query.sql: SELECT f.*, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(module_code,'-'),module_name) from sys_module where module_id = f.function_module ) module_code_name, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =f.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM SYS_FUNCTION f #WHERE_CLAUSE# ORDER BY f.function_code

query.sql: SELECT f.function_id, concat(concat(f.function_code,'-'),f.function_des) function_des FROM SYS_FUNCTION f ORDER BY f.function_code

sqls.executeSql: INSERT INTO sys_function (function_code, function_des, jsp_pager, image, priority, function_module, create_by, create_date, last_update_by, last_update_date) VALUES (${@function_code}, ${@function_des}, ${@jsp_pager}, ${@image}, ${@priority}, ${@function_module}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), ${@user_id}, NOW())

update sys_function set function_des = ${@function_des} , jsp_pager = ${@jsp_pager} , image=${@image}, priority =${@priority}, function_module =${@function_module}, last_update_by = ${@user_id} , last_update_date = NOW() where function_id = ${@function_id}
